Directions: In bread machine pan, place all ingredients in the order suggested by manufacturer. Select dough setting (check dough after 5 minutes of mixing; add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water or flour if needed). When the cycle is completed, tun dough onto a lightly floured surface. Punch down; cover and let stand for 10 minutes.

Divide dough into 20 pieces; shape each into a ball. Place 2 in. apart on baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 45 minutes. Bake at 375 degrees F for 12 minutes or until golden brown.  Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
